title: Comicstaan
overview: Comicstaan brings together seven amongst the biggest comedians in India, to find the next big name in stand-up. Hosted by Abish Mathew and Sumukhi Suresh, the top ten contestants will be judged by a seven-member jury panel. The jury comprises of Tanmay Bhat, Biswa Kalyan Rath, Kanan Gill, Kenny Sebastian, Sapan Verma, Kaneez Surka, and Naveen Richard.
